title: Regarding the "Ask Riot" question corners...
body:
Shouldn't you guys be taking at least one question from the boards?  

I'm not sure about others, but "_between What method or criteria do you use to choose which champion gets the victorious skin each year?",_ and _"Why did you make turrets wet towels/Why is our income completely crippled?"_, I know which one I'd like Riot to answer...
